com.orc.io
Interface MultiplexListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
EchoClient, EchoServer, MultiplexAdapter
public interface MultiplexListener

Interface for multiplexer call backs NIO channel has 4 callback operations: connect, accept, read, write This class provides a standard interface a multiplexer can use for callbacks

Method Summary
 void onAccept(java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel channel, java.lang.Object attachment)
          A callback indicating that a connection is incoming and has been accepted by the host
 void onConnect(java.nio.channels.SocketChannel channel, java.lang.Object attachment)
          A callback indicating that an outgoing connection has connected to it's target
 void onRead(java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel channel, java.lang.Object attachment)
          A callback indicating that data has been written to the channel is ready for reading into the program
 void onWrite(java.nio.channels.WritableByteChannel channel, java.lang.Object attachment)
          A callback indicating that the channel can be written to by the program
 

Method Detail

onRead

void onRead(java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel channel,
            java.lang.Object attachment)
A callback indicating that data has been written to the channel is ready for reading into the program

Parameters:
channel - A readable byte channel
attachment - Any object attached to the SelectKey by the multiplexer

onWrite

void onWrite(java.nio.channels.WritableByteChannel channel,
             java.lang.Object attachment)
A callback indicating that the channel can be written to by the program

Parameters:
channel - A writeable byte channel
attachment - Any object attached to the SelectKey by the multiplexer

onConnect

void onConnect(java.nio.channels.SocketChannel channel,
               java.lang.Object attachment)
A callback indicating that an outgoing connection has connected to it's target

Parameters:
channel - The channel that has been connected to the target
attachment - Any object attached to the SelectKey by the multiplexer

onAccept

void onAccept(java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel channel,
              java.lang.Object attachment)
A callback indicating that a connection is incoming and has been accepted by the host

Parameters:
channel - The host's channel containing the incoming connection
attachment - Any object attached to the SelectKey by the multiplexer
